Weapons.Description: Standard issue fighting/work knife used by USMC infantry during WWII.
Austrian knife designed and manufactured by Glock. Developed in close coordination with Austrian special forces.
A prominent WWI and WWII German manufactured grenade that is a great piece for any collector. Fully functional.
An extremely rare piece of German WWI equipment that was used in tandem with the Granatenwerfer 16 infantry mortar. Not functional.

Vehicles.Description: The infamous tank that was most recognizably used during the Gulf war by U.S. forces. Though the first generation of these tanks have been out of serive for more than 20 years, we are proud to be able to sell our customers fully functioning units.

Most notably used during the Vietnam war to help U.S. Army units break through fortified positions and overrun the enemy. These tried and true armored troop carriers come in great condition and still function up to manufactuer standards.

Introduced in 1959 and thouroughly tried and tested during the Vietnam War, this recently retired helicopter now comes to customers fully functional and ready to fly. Whether your an avid flyer or veteran collecter this helicopter will not fail to please.

The AH-64 Apache, produced by Boeing, is one of the most reliable and deadly helicopters in use by the U.S. military today. Through lucky overstock and trade deals, Saya's Emporium has been able to acquire fully operational AH-64's for our customers.

Vehicles.productName: Arleigh Burke-class Aegis guided missile destroyer
Vehicles.Description: The Arleigh Burke-class Aegis guided missile destroyer is the U.S Navy's leading blue water fighting ship. Numerous navy's around the world have modeled their ships around the Arleigh Burke. Just as our unfortunately closed sister company, Saya's Armory, sold Arleigh Burke-class destroyers, we intend to follow tradition and provide our loyal customers with a way to purchase this customer favorite product. Fully operational. Munitions not included.
Utilized by the Norwegian Navy, the Skjold-class corvette is heavily armed with missles and ballistics for any self defense purposes.

Miscellaneous.Description: Kuhl sleek warm jacket boasts a baffled water-repellent nylon/spandex shell with 800-fill-power goose down. Reinforced shoulders zipper closures. Machine wash

Miscellaneous.Description: Quilted longline jacket with shirt tail hem matching corduroy collar and patch pockets. Polyester. Dry clean.

Miscellaneous.size: Sizes S M L XL XXL.
Miscellaneous.Description: Yarn-dyed indigenous-inspired pattern will catch your attention in this chambray-lined button front shirt with two pockets corduroy-lined neckline and side gussets. Cotton. Machine wash.
